Study Design : This study prospective observational study patient undergo treatment leishmaniasis Impavido US weigh > 75 kg volunteer provide information clinical response treatment 6 month start treatment . Population : Leishmaniasis patient treat Impavido weigh 75 kg . Drug Product : Drug name : Impavido ( 50 mg capsule ) . Dosing regimen : per Impavido Product Label Study Procedures : Patients weigh 75 kg become aware Impavido Higher-Weight Patient Registry via Impavido website . By call 1-866-588-5405 , patient connect Impavido Higher-Weight Patient Registry Coordinating Center . A trained staff member acquaint patient goal procedure study . If patient tentatively agree participate study telephone , patient mail information form , Consent/Assent Forms , Consent patient 's physician release medical information . Receipt two sign Consent and/or Assent Forms Coordinating Center signify patient consent . The Coordinating Center contact patient 's physician end treatment , 1 , 3 , 6 month complete treatment , collect data efficacy adverse effect ( treatment ) .
